Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
There are 2 major Game engins to my knowledge in industry.
Unity - Microsoft supported - C# Language
Unreal Engine - Open Source?? - C++ Language
Both I think supports other native languages too, not entirely sure.
If these Game Engines has the libraries to talk to the Komodo Blockchain RPC API, it makes the Games developers life easier.
